question_1.question: What must be installed before adding the TimeXtender Oracle Data Source provider to an ODX instance?
question_1.explanation: The TimeXtender Oracle Data Source provider has a dependency on Oracle's ADO provider, which needs to be installed first.

question_2.question: What should you do if you receive an 'out of range date conversion' error in TimeXtender when using an Oracle data source?

options.option_b: Reinstall the Oracle Data Source provider
options.option_c: Set the 'out of range date conversion' option to 'MS SQL min/max date'

question_2.explanation: To fix the 'out of range date conversion' error, you should set the option to 'MS SQL min/max date' in the Data Conversions section of the data source settings.
